() None of these () 1/3 (x) 3 () 4
2. How many revolute joints does a slider crank mechanism have?
() 4 (x) 3 () 1 () 0
3. At which of the following crank angle positions is the slider at its extreme position
(x) 180o () 30o () 90o () 120o
4. For a given input crank angle how many positions of the slider are possible for fixed link lengths?
() At least 2 () More than 2 (x) Only 1 () Depends on link lengths
5. How many prismatic joints does a slider crank mechanism have
() 0 (x) 1 () 3 () 4
